TopicTitle: RedBull posts full video of Felix Baumgartner's jump from 127000 feet

Articles.Content:
About time! It took them (exactly) one year to edit the video, it seems

Thanks for posting this.

About time! It took them (exactly) one year to edit the video, it seems

Thanks for posting this.

More likely legal requirements, that they couldn't put the video out for public (free) viewing within a year of the jump, allowing Baumgartner to monetize his feat as speaker, showing the video, etc. I'm not for sure about this, but especially when this is indeed exactly a year, I wouldn't be surprised if that were the case.
